short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open SimilarWeb for the current tab's domain, while clearing cookies to bypass the registration wall.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:

A simple tool that allows you to open a website's page on SimilarWeb.com directly from your current tab, with the added functionality of clearing SimilarWeb cookies to bypass the registration wall.

Key Features:

- Simple Tool: Easy to use with just a single click.
- Quick Access to SimilarWeb: Instantly navigate to the SimilarWeb page for the current website's domain.
- Cookie Clearing: Automatically clears SimilarWeb cookies before opening the page to bypass the registration wall.

How It Works:

- Click on the extension icon while browsing any website.
- The extension fetches the current tab's domain.
- It clears all cookies for SimilarWeb.com to ensure unrestricted access.
- A new tab opens with the SimilarWeb analysis page for the current website.

This extension is perfect for anyone who frequently uses SimilarWeb for website analytics and wants a seamless, hassle-free experience.
